name: brnc/php-heroku-meta
description: Helper to get sync Heroku's available extentions.

suggest.ext-bz2: Always loaded by Heroku - not dockerized locally!
suggest.ext-calendar: Requirable by Heroku - not dockerized locally!
suggest.ext-exif: Requirable by Heroku - not dockerized locally!
suggest.ext-gd: Requirable by Heroku - not dockerized locally!
suggest.ext-gettext: Requirable by Heroku - not dockerized locally!
suggest.ext-gmp: Requirable by Heroku - not dockerized locally!
suggest.ext-imap: Requirable by Heroku - not dockerized locally!
suggest.ext-ldap: Requirable by Heroku - not dockerized locally!
suggest.ext-mysqli: Always loaded by Heroku - not dockerized locally!
suggest.ext-pcntl: Requirable by Heroku - not dockerized locally!
suggest.ext-pdo_mysql: Always loaded by Heroku - not dockerized locally!
suggest.ext-pgsql: Always loaded by Heroku - not dockerized locally!
suggest.ext-shmop: Requirable by Heroku - not dockerized locally!
suggest.ext-soap: Requirable by Heroku - not dockerized locally!
suggest.ext-xsl: Requirable by Heroku - not dockerized locally!
suggest.ext-zend: Always loaded by Heroku - not dockerized locally!
suggest.ext-zip: Always loaded by Heroku - not dockerized locally!
